testcase.name: loginByOpera

error.message: The path to the driver executable The path to the driver executable must be set by the webdriver.opera.driver system property; for more information, see https://github.com/operasoftware/operachromiumdriver. The latest version can be downloaded from https://github.com/operasoftware/operachromiumdriver/releases
